query:
-- Primeiro, vamos verificar se a tabela existe e remover as colunas antigas
ALTER TABLE successionCandidates 
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS performanceRating,
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS potentialRating,
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS nineBoxPosition,
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS notes;

-- Adicionar as novas colunas conforme o modal
ALTER TABLE successionCandidates
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS performance ENUM('baixo', 'medio', 'alto') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medio' AFTER priority,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS potential ENUM('baixo', 'medio', 'alto') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medio' AFTER performance,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS comments TEXT AFTER developmentActions;

-- Atualizar o enum de readinessLevel
ALTER TABLE successionCandidates
  MODIFY COLUMN readinessLevel ENUM('pronto_ate_12_meses', 'pronto_12_24_meses', 'pronto_24_36_meses', 'pronto_mais_36_meses') NOT NULL;
command:

-- Primeiro, vamos verificar se a tabela existe e remover as colunas antigas
ALTER TABLE successionCandidates 
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS performanceRating,
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS potentialRating,
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS nineBoxPosition,
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS notes;

-- Adicionar as novas colunas conforme o modal
ALTER TABLE successionCandidates
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS performance ENUM('baixo', 'medio', 'alto') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medio' AFTER priority,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS potential ENUM('baixo', 'medio', 'alto') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medio' AFTER performance,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS comments TEXT AFTER developmentActions;

-- Atualizar o enum de readinessLevel
ALTER TABLE successionCandidates
  MODIFY COLUMN readinessLevel ENUM('pronto_ate_12_meses', 'pronto_12_24_meses', 'pronto_24_36_meses', 'pronto_mais_36_meses') NOT NULL;
